member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:JSend.WebApi.Properties.StringResources.BadRequest_WhiteSpaceReason
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Reason cannot be an empty string..

member.name: P:JSend.WebApi.Properties.StringResources.ConfigurationMustContainFormatter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The controller's configuration must contain a formatter that supports the media type application/json..

member.name: P:JSend.WebApi.Properties.StringResources.DefaultErrorMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An error has occurred..

member.name: P:JSend.WebApi.Properties.StringResources.ErrorResponse_WhiteSpaceMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Message cannot be an empty string..

member.name: P:JSend.WebApi.Properties.StringResources.NotFound_DefaultMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The requested resource could not be found..

member.name: P:JSend.WebApi.Properties.StringResources.NotFound_WhiteSpaceReason
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Reason cannot be an empty string..

member.name: P:JSend.WebApi.Properties.StringResources.Request_RequestContextMustNotBeNull
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The request must have a request context..

member.name: M:JSend.WebApi.JSendApiController.JSendInternalServerError(System.Exception,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Object)

member.param: The exception to include in the error.
An optional meaningful, end-user-readable (or at the least log-worthy) message, explaining what went wrong. If none is provided, and if is set to , the exception's message will be used instead.
A numeric code corresponding to the error, if applicable.
An optional generic container for any other information about the error. If none is provided, and if is set to , the exception's details will be used instead.
member.returns: A with the specified values.
